dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.value
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the SearchBuilder value select element

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.value` changes what will be displayed in the text of the SearchBuilder value select.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchBuilder.value` parameter is `'Value'`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the value select to display a default text, in this case `'Value'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.value` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.
